sqlMap.select: select POSITION_NO as positionNo, POSITION_NAME as positionName, POSITION_SEQ as positionSeq from comm_positions order by position_no asc
sqlMap.update: update comm_positions set POSITION_NAME = #positionName#, POSITION_SEQ = #positionSeq# where position_no = #positionNo#
sqlMap.select: select POSITION_NO as positionNo, POSITION_NAME as positionName, POSITION_SEQ as positionSeq from comm_positions where position_no = #value#
